question: India has appealed against the international arbitration court’s ruling in favour of which Telecom company?
explanation:
India has recently challenged the international arbitration court’s ruling in favour of Vodafone in the retrospective tax case, as per media reports.
Vodafone had won the case against India’s income tax (IT) department, which demanded over ₹22,000 crore on a retrospective basis. The Permanent Court of Arbitration in held that any attempt by India to enforce tax demand on Vodafone would be a violation of the country’s law obligations.
